meanings: (교체·교환하다) change (sth for sth); (맞바꾸다) exchange (sth for sth), trade[swap] (sth for sth); (오래된 것을) replace (sth with...
실용회화-기본대화 Excuse me, may I change my seat?
실용회화- 음식주문 May I change my order?
실용회화-교환 및 반품 May I change the size?

vlive.korean: [상큼] 바꿔도 되나요? [Cute] Can I change rooms? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.20
[주황방] 아니다, 저 방 바꿔도 되나요? [Orange room] Oh no. Can I change rooms? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.20
vlive.english: [Orange room] Oh no. Can I change rooms?

vlive.korean: 아니야 바꿔도 된대 - 바꿔도 된대? No. We can change. - Can we? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.16 인간 체스 #1 (Human Chess #1)
vlive.english: No. We can change. - Can we?

vlive.korean: 그게 언어 바꿔도 돼? Can we change the language? 듣기 View video TWICE : 나모사
형! 스피커로 바꿔도 돼요? Can I change it to speakerphone? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 티니와 함께하는 여상이 생일 점심🎂
vlive.english: Can I change it to speakerphone?

examples.korean: If it's not too much of an inconvenience, could we move the meeting to August 2? 발음듣기 크게 번거롭지 않으시면, 회의 일정을 8월 2일로 바꿔도 되겠습니까? DARAKWON
examples.english: If it's not too much of an inconvenience, could we move the meeting to August 2? 발음

examples.korean: Can I change my seat to an aisle seat? 발음듣기 복도 쪽 자리로 바꿔도 되나요? Neungyule
examples.english: Can I change my seat to an aisle seat? 발음

examples.korean: So if you went over to CD, you'd still need an ordinary player or deck for your existing record collection. 발음듣기 그래서 CD로 바꿔도 이전부터 갖고 있던 레코드를 감상하려면 여전히 그 플레이어가 필요하다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: So if you went over to CD, you'd still need an ordinary player or deck for your existing record collection. 발음

examples.korean: Can I change the channel? 발음듣기 채널을 바꿔도 돼? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can I change the channel? 발음

examples.korean: May I change the size? 발음듣기 다른 사이즈로 바꿔도 됩니까? Practical English Conversation Dictionary
examples.english: May I change the size? 발음
